doc.name: PullSupplier
doc.description: An actor that send data to a remote consumer when there is pull request. Specify the ORB initial property with theORBInitProperties paremerter, for example: "-ORBInitialHost xyz.eecs.berkeley.edu -ORBInitialPort 1050" where "xyz.eecs.berkeley.edu" is the machine runing name server, and "1050" is the port for name service. Specify the name of the supplier with SupplierName, which is registered on the name server. This actor can only be used in the CI domain currently. It is an active actor, and has an seperate thread to guard its execution. when the manage thread call its prefire, it will wait if there is no pull request, otherwise it pull data from its providers, and send the data to satisfy the request.
doc.author: Yang Zhao
doc.property: The name of the supplier. The type of the Parameter is StringToken.
